summary: Experienced Technical Project Manager with a strong background in business analysis, technical channel enablement, and solutions engineering. Proven ability to manage complex projects, exceed sales targets, and build strategic partnerships. Skilled in delivering technical presentations, influencing product roadmaps, and innovating solutions.

duties: Conducted engaging training exercises to equip team members with necessary knowledge and skills.
Developed an app to streamline the business ordering adn inventory for ease of use.
Built an off-site commissary to help relieve production max out of central kitchen.
Inventory control and cost management of all items used within the kitchen.
